::Symphony::

    Symphony's internal repair system had given him some cons=
ciousness.  Most of his body was still ripped apart.  He slowly crawled awa=
y from the Decepticon base, but only got as far as two or three feet.  He o=
pened up his comm-link to all Maximals.

    "Maximals....This is....Sympho=
-*FZZZ*, I need, *FZZZ* help, right *FZZZ* Decepti-*FZZZ* base.  I'm slowly=
 *FZZZ*......*BEEEPP*" Symphony's com went out, it had been damaged from th=
e Terrorcons as well.

    Symphony closed his eyes, hoping to the Matrix t=
o be saved.
